effect.sun_moon: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.sun_moon: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
